Header.title: Visualize DSA with us
Header.paragraph: An interactive and engaging platform for learning, visualizing, and comparing Datastructures and algorithms in effective way.

About.paragraph: We are an exceptional team of CSE sophomores from IIT Roorkee, who are dedicated to the craft of tackling real-world challenges in the software industry. We possess a strong foundation in computer science and engineering and are committed to utilise our skills to create a positive impact on the world. Whether it is improving user experiences, streamlining processes, or developing cutting-edge technologies, we are eager to take on the challenge. Our innovative ideas, collaborative spirit, and tireless work ethic make us a force to be reckoned with in the software industry. We are confident that our team will make a significant impact in the tech world in the years to come, and we are excited to be a part of this journey.

Services.name: Track your progress
Services.text: Register your handle to track your your progress on different cp judge platforms.

Services.name: Sorting in Array
Services.text: Explore and visualize different sorting techniques on array

Services.name: Searching in Array
Services.text: Analyze and depict various search algorithms for arrays.

Services.name: Linkedlist
Services.text: Linkedlist are dynamic structures far more optimised than arrays.Visualize different operations & algorithms on linkedlist

Services.name: Trees
Services.text: A binary tree is a special case of a tree data structure, where each node in the tree has at most two child nodes, known as the left child and the right child.Analyze different traversal algorithms on Binary search trees.

Features.title: Visualize
Features.text: A real time simulation of how algorithms work on various data structures based on the custom data input by the user

Features.title: Track
Features.text: A progress tracker for the advancements made by the user in Competitive Programming over a period of time

Features.title: Practice
Features.text: Practise the best topic-specific competitive programming questions from popular platforms.

Features.title: Resources
Features.text: Explore best resources for making your competitive programming journey easy.
